document_data.name: Scab Eaters
document_data.mainbody: The '''Scab Eaters''' were a tribe of [[goblin]]s that inhabited the [[Orsraun Mountains]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Their members typically wielded [[spear]]s and rode upon the backs of [[dire wolves]].
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], the Scab Eaters were one of three [[goblinoid]] tribes—the other two being the [[hobgoblin]] tribes the [[Back Crackers]] and [[Spine Snappers]]—that were rallied together by chief [[No-Nose]] of the [[Bloodier Teeth]] tribe to fight in the [[Battle of Urml]], an assault on a [[human]] village of the [[Urml|same name]].
